alert.note: Alert for Aroostook; Penobscot; Washington (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 8:29PM EDT until July 12 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Washington County in southeastern Maine... Southeastern Aroostook County in northern Maine... East central Penobscot County in east central Maine... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 828 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles west of Cary Plantation to 8 miles northwest of Springfield, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Danforth, Hodgdon, Island Falls, Amity, Haynesville, Cary Plantation, Wytopitlock, Reed Plantation, Linneus, Mattawamkeag, Winn, Weston, Cary, Prentiss, Kingman, Reed, Orient, Macwahoc, Bancroft and Glenwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
